name: AI Writer
description:
AI Writer is a content generation tool using advanced AI models to create articles from minimal input (just a few keywords)​

. It also offers an AI-powered editor that reads your content and provides improvement suggestions, examining words, phrases, and sentences that might need refinement.
use_case: Quickly drafting articles based on a headline or keywords; getting AI to suggest edits and improvements on existing text; generating content for niche topics

name: AdCreative
description: AI-powered ad creative generation platform
use_case: Ad design; marketing creative; social media ads

name: AdZis
description:
AdZis is an AI content generation tool specifically designed for e-commerce​

. It can write product descriptions at scale. AdZis takes product data and generates descriptive copy for online catalogs, enabling e-commerce businesses to quickly populate their websites with unique descriptions for thousands of products.
use_case: Generating product descriptions for large online catalogs (e.g., marketplace sellers); writing category page content and SEO text for e-commerce sites; automating content for new product listings

name: Ada
description: AI customer service automation platform
use_case: Customer support automation; chatbots; personalized support

name: Adobe Express
description:
Adobe Express (formerly Adobe Spark) is a cloud-based platform that enables users to easily produce various types of content​

. It offers many templates for projects and a library of graphics and images. Users can create videos, presentations, social media posts, and more. (Adobe Express incorporates Adobe’s AI, e.g., for quick image and design recommendations.)
use_case: Quickly making social media posts or stories using templates; creating simple promotional videos with stock images and text; designing flyers or posters without advanced design skills

name: Article Forge
description:
Article Forge produces text based on user-specified parameters, capable of generating content on any topic at large scale​

. It can rapidly produce thousands of articles, making it useful for creating blog posts, product descriptions, or website content with minimal human input.
use_case: Bulk generation of SEO-friendly blog articles; populating content for content farms or long-tail SEO pages; quickly drafting descriptions for many products

name: Asana
description: Project management platform with AI features for task organization and workflow
use_case: Project tracking; team collaboration; workflow management

name: Asta Powerproject
description:
Asta Powerproject is a project management solution that helps complete projects efficiently and within budget​

. It can be used for various project types and sizes. The web-based application allows companies to create strategic plans by integrating projects and annual goals into a cohesive roadmap​

.
use_case: Detailed scheduling for construction or engineering projects; linking multiple projects to overall company objectives; tracking project progress against baseline with automated updates

name: Beatoven
description:
Beatoven.ai is an AI music generator that composes unique, mood-based music tunes for videos and podcasts​

. Users can select a mood/genre and length, and Beatoven will produce a customizable soundtrack. This helps creators add royalty-free music to their projects without needing music composition skills or worrying about copyright.
pricing: Freemium (Free limited downloads; Paid for extended use)
use_case: Generating background music for a YouTube vlog (selecting mood like “uplifting” or “ambient”); creating podcast intro/outro music tailored to the show’s theme; producing a variety of music tracks for a video game or app without hiring a composer

name: Beautiful.ai
description: AI-powered presentation software with smart templates
use_case: Professional presentations; sales decks; pitch decks

name: Bizplan
description:
Bizplan is a business planning platform that helps users create professional business plans using AI-powered tools​

. It offers modules and step-by-step guides to build the plan, and can auto-generate financial projections. It also supports team collaboration and even connecting with potential investors via its platform (as part of Startups.com network).
use_case: Crafting a startup business plan by following guided prompts for each section (market analysis, team, financials); automatically generating 5-year financial projections based on basic revenue and expense assumptions; collaborating with co-founders on editing the business plan in real-time online

name: Bubble
description: No-code platform with AI-assisted app building features
pricing: Free tier available; paid plans from $25/month
use_case: Web app development; prototype creation; startup MVPs

name: CVViZ
description: AI-powered recruitment automation platform for resume screening
pricing: Contact for pricing; tiered based on hiring volume
use_case: Resume screening; candidate matching; recruitment automation

name: Canva Magic Studio
description: AI-powered design features within Canva including Magic Design and Magic Eraser
pricing: Some features in free tier; full access with Canva Pro ($12.99/month)
use_case: Design creation; image editing; brand assets

name: ChatBot
description: ChatBot (by LiveChat) simplifies creating versatile chatbots. It easily connects with various tools and platforms through integrations. These chatbots generate engaging responses, allowing companies to promote their brand, products, and services via text, images, quick replies, buttons, etc.
use_case: Building customer support bots for e-commerce sites; automating FAQ answers on websites; engaging customers with product info via chat

name: ChatGPT
description:
ChatGPT is an AI-powered natural language processing tool that allows users to have conversations that mimic human interactions. It can answer questions, help with tasks such as writing emails and essays, and assist with coding​

. The tool is currently available to the public for free as it is in the research and feedback-gathering phase.
use_case: Answering questions; drafting emails and essays; code assistance

name: Chorus (ZoomInfo)
description:
Chorus is a conversation intelligence platform (part of ZoomInfo) that analyzes sales calls and customer conversations. It provides tools to engage with customers in natural, human-like conversations and captures key insights from those discussions​

. Chorus helps organizations improve their sales and support by learning from past interactions.
use_case: Recording and transcribing sales calls for coaching purposes; identifying common customer objections or requests from call analysis; training new sales reps using successful call snippets

name: Claude
description: AI assistant created by Anthropic designed to be helpful harmless and honest
pricing: Free tier available; Claude Pro at $20/month; Claude Team and Enterprise plans available
use_case: Writing assistance; research; complex reasoning; conversation

name: Cleanup.pictures
description:
Cleanup.pictures is a web-based application that allows users to enhance images by removing unwanted elements (people, watermarks, blemishes, etc.)​

. Its AI accurately distinguishes and removes these elements, providing impressive results even to non-designers. This tool is popular for quickly touching up photos and graphics without advanced photo editing skills.
use_case: Removing tourists or strangers from a vacation photo; erasing a date stamp or watermark from an image you have rights to use; quickly cleaning product photos by removing background distractions

name: Cleanvoice
description:
Cleanvoice is an AI that removes filler sounds, stuttering, and mouth sounds from podcast or audio recordings​

. It automatically cleans audio by cutting out “um,” “uh,” long pauses, coughs, and lip smacks, resulting in a more polished final audio. This saves audio editors significant time in post-production for podcasts and voiceovers.
use_case: Polishing a podcast recording by removing all the “ums” and dead air automatically; cleaning up audio for an audiobook to sound more professional; preprocessing voiceover recordings before adding to videos to eliminate distractions

name: ClickUp
description: Productivity platform with AI features for project management and task automation
pricing: Free tier available; paid plans from $5/user/month
use_case: Project management; document creation; team collaboration

name: Clockwise
description: AI calendar assistant that optimizes schedules and creates focus time
pricing: Free tier available; paid plans from $6.75/user/month
use_case: Meeting optimization; focus time creation; team scheduling

name: ClosersCopy
description:
ClosersCopy is an AI writing software that does not rely on GPT-3 – it uses its own proprietary model trained on marketing copy​

. It’s specifically geared toward sales and marketing “closing” copy. Users leverage ClosersCopy to generate persuasive sales emails, landing page copy, and other conversion-focused text with a unique AI model.
use_case: Writing sales email sequences aimed at high conversion; creating landing page copy or Facebook ad text that persuades customers; developing unique value propositions in copy

name: Copy.ai
description:
Copy.ai is a free artificial intelligence tool that assists teams with a wide range of copywriting tasks, including creating product descriptions, ad copy, emails, blog posts, video scripts, and website content​

. It generates unique and engaging content that is easy to read. Additionally, it is useful for crafting social media captions, Facebook posts, and generating startup ideas.
use_case: Generating marketing copy (ads, product descriptions); writing blog and social media posts

name: CopyMonkey
description:
CopyMonkey.ai is software that generates and optimizes e-commerce copy​

. It provides tools to improve product descriptions and can test different versions to see which resonates most with customers. By analyzing existing copy effectiveness, it helps brand managers and small businesses increase trust and conversion through better product text.
use_case: Optimizing Amazon product listings by generating variant descriptions and seeing which yields better conversions; analyzing an online store’s product text for improvement (clarity, length, keywords); bulk-generating initial drafts of product descriptions when onboarding many SKUs

name: Copysmith
description:
Copysmith is content automation software for the web. It lets users create, manage, and publish content like blog posts, articles, infographics, or social media posts using AI​

. Copysmith aims to support content teams in scaling content production with consistent quality.
use_case: Managing an e-commerce catalog’s product descriptions at scale; bulk-generating social media captions or ad variants; quickly turning data into written content

name: Crayon
description:
Crayon is a competitive intelligence software that uses automation to capture and analyze market intelligence​

. It monitors data from all aspects of a company (not just product performance) to identify patterns. Crayon can highlight competitors’ strengths and weaknesses in specific areas by sifting through millions of data points (websites, social media, reviews, etc.).
use_case: Tracking competitor website changes and product updates; aggregating industry news and social media mentions to see market trends; analyzing competitor marketing strategies and messaging over time

name: CrowdStrike
description:
CrowdStrike is a cybersecurity platform; its threat-intelligence system uses AI to prevent and mitigate security risks​

. It provides swift incident response and recommendations for next steps during cyberattacks. CrowdStrike’s cloud-based AI learns from threats across clients to improve malware detection.
use_case: Endpoint protection for enterprise devices using AI to detect malware; real-time threat hunting and breach prevention; analyzing threat data to recommend response

name: Cursor
description: AI-first code editor that helps developers write understand and improve code
pricing: Free tier available; Pro plan at $20/month
use_case: Software development; code refactoring; programming learning

name: DALL·E 3
description: OpenAI's advanced image generation model that creates detailed images from text prompts
pricing: Available through ChatGPT Plus ($20/month) or API credits
use_case: Content creation; design visualization; artistic expression

name: DeepSeek
description: Advanced AI language model with strong reasoning and knowledge capabilities
pricing: Free tier with limitations; subscription plans available
use_case: Complex problem-solving; coding assistance; research

name: Descript
description:
Descript is an AI-powered media editing tool primarily known for transcription and audio/video editing. It transcribes videos in real-time, allowing users (especially those hard of hearing) to quickly understand content without watching the entire video​

. Descript also allows editing audio by editing text (delete words to remove them from audio).
use_case: Transcribing podcasts and editing the transcript to edit the audio; generating video captions automatically; removing filler words (“um”, “uh”) from audio via text deletion

name: Design Beast
description:
Design Beast is an online platform providing both graphic design and video animation capabilities​

. Users can create designs from scratch or use pre-made templates. It includes a wide array of effects and animations to enhance visuals. Essentially, it’s an all-in-one creative suite with AI features to speed up design and animation tasks.
use_case: Designing social media graphics or ads using templates; creating simple animated marketing videos or GIFs; quickly applying visual effects to images for campaigns

name: Design Evo
description:
Design Evo is a logo creation tool that allows you to create professional logos fast​

. It provides thousands of templates and resources, so users aren’t starting from scratch. By customizing these AI-suggested logo designs, even non-designers can craft a unique logo for their brand.
use_case: Creating a new company or project logo quickly by customizing templates; generating multiple logo ideas to choose from; making social media profile icons or app icons

name: Durable
description:
Users can get a website generated with AI using Durable. It offers a checklist to drive traffic to the site, customer management tools to convert site visitors into clients, and streamlines operations with integrated financial tools (e.g. Money accounts, insurance, LLC formation)​

. (Durable uses AI to build simple business websites quickly.)
use_case: Quickly building a small business website; automating basic website SEO setup; integrating basic CRM and operations tools

name: ElevenLabs
description: AI voice generation platform with natural-sounding voices and voice cloning
use_case: Voiceovers; audiobooks; content localization

name: Fathom
description: AI meeting assistant that records transcribes summarizes and highlights key moments
pricing: Free tier available; Pro plan at approximately $20/user/month
use_case: Meeting documentation; team collaboration; note-taking

name: FeedHive
description: AI-driven social media scheduling and content creation tool
use_case: Content creation; scheduling; analytics

name: Filmora
description: Video editing software with AI-powered features for automated editing
use_case: Video editing; content creation; social media posts

name: Fireflies
description:
Fireflies is an AI meeting assistant that can record and transcribe calls instantly. It offers a Chrome extension to capture meetings & calls directly from the browser. It provides a searchable transcript, and can auto-join calendar calls to transcribe them​

. It also integrates with dialers, Zapier, and offers an API. (In short, Fireflies eliminates manual note-taking by transcribing meetings.)
use_case: Transcribing meetings and conference calls; generating meeting summaries; making call content searchable for later review

name: Flair
description:
Flair AI is a tool that generates artwork from text input​

. Users can create unique images by selecting art styles and feeding in text prompts. The outputs can be high-quality images, and users can save their favorite artwork across devices. Flair is often used to quickly prototype illustrations or to produce artistic images without commissioning an artist.
use_case: Creating custom illustrations for a blog post using a text description (e.g., “a futuristic city at dawn in watercolor style”); generating concept art for a design moodboard; producing social media post backgrounds or story images from text ideas

name: FlexClip
description:
FlexClip is an easy-to-use online video creation tool with simple features​

. It’s used by millions worldwide for both personal and business purposes to produce videos. FlexClip provides an intuitive interface to stitch together video clips, photos, and music into a finished video with minimal effort, suitable for marketing, slideshows, or personal stories.
use_case: Creating quick marketing or slideshow videos from images and short clips; generating family event videos or personal story videos without complex software; producing simple explainer videos for small businesses

name: Forethought
description: AI customer support platform with ticket routing and self-service
use_case: Customer support automation; ticket routing; knowledge base

name: Frase
description:
Frase is an AI writing assistant popular in workplaces​

. Companies use Frase to generate content for specific topics or niches, and digital agencies use it to produce all types of content for clients. Frase can also help optimize content for SEO by analyzing SERP information and suggesting relevant content to include.
use_case: Creating draft articles tailored to niche topics for clients; optimizing existing web content by filling gaps identified in competitor content; generating FAQ sections or summaries

name: Free Agent
description:
FreeAgent is an AI-powered accounting software for small businesses and freelancers​

. It offers features like invoice generation, expense tracking, cash flow monitoring, tax timeline predictions, time tracking, and receipt management. It also includes timesheets and dashboards for easy monitoring of finances, helping users keep track of cash flows and obligations with minimal manual effort.
use_case: Automatically generating and emailing invoices to clients on a schedule; tracking expenses by scanning receipts with a mobile app and having AI categorize them; monitoring cash flow and getting alerts if bank balance trends indicate a potential shortfall (with suggestions to mitigate)

name: Futurenda
description:
Futurenda is a calendar planner that allows flexible task management without wasted time​

. It is designed for modern work hours, remote work, and supports time tracking. Futurenda features customizable work hours, automatic task management, flexible day planning, calendar integration, and task reminders​

.
use_case: Managing a freelancer’s variable schedule automatically; planning tasks around irregular work hours or multiple gigs; integrating personal and work calendars to avoid conflicts

name: Gamma
description: AI-powered presentation platform that creates beautiful presentations from text
use_case: Presentation creation; team presentations; sales decks

name: Genei
description:
Genei is a tool that condenses articles, videos, and other content into brief, comprehensible summaries​

. It highlights key points while retaining essential information to keep reader interest. Genei is used for research, enabling quick review of lengthy materials by extracting the main ideas.
use_case: Summarizing research papers or long news articles for quick insight; generating summaries of YouTube videos or podcasts for content creators; highlighting key findings in reports

name: GetGenie
description:
GetGenie is a WordPress plugin that serves as an AI writing assistant for SEO content. It works within the content management system to help optimize and write content​

. GetGenie can suggest SEO-friendly text and assist with blog writing directly in WordPress, streamlining the content creation workflow.
use_case: Assisting bloggers in WordPress to draft and optimize posts; generating SEO meta descriptions and titles; suggesting relevant keywords while writing content

name: Glean
description: AI-powered workplace search platform
use_case: Enterprise search; knowledge discovery; information access

name: Gong.io
description:
Gong is a “revenue intelligence” platform that uses AI to track customer interactions (calls, emails, meetings) and provides insights. It detects potential issues and offers suggestions to prevent churn proactively​

. Sales teams use Gong to get real-time insights from conversations and shorten sales cycles with data-driven coaching.
use_case: Analyzing sales call transcripts for deal risks; coaching sales reps by highlighting effective vs. ineffective phrases; forecasting sales pipeline health

name: Grammarly
description: AI-powered writing assistant that checks grammar spelling and writing style
pricing: Free tier available; Premium from $12/month; Business plans available
use_case: Writing improvement; error checking; style enhancement

name: Grok
description: AI assistant by xAI designed to answer questions with wit and humor
use_case: Information retrieval; conversational assistance

name: Growbots
description:
Growbots is an AI-powered platform that assists companies in growing their business by providing insights on improving marketing and sales​

. It helps automate outbound marketing processes: finding and targeting prospects, sending personalized emails, and timing follow-ups. The goal is to improve sales performance through AI-driven outreach optimization.
use_case: Automatically building prospect lists and generating outreach email campaigns; personalizing cold emails at scale; scheduling follow-ups for lead nurturing

name: Guru
description: Knowledge management platform with AI features for organizing company information
pricing: Free tier available; paid plans from $5/user/month
use_case: Knowledge base creation; team information sharing; customer support resources

name: H2O.ai
description:
H2O.ai is a machine learning platform enabling companies to make data-driven decisions with real-time insights​

. Its tools handle a wide range of operations such as fraud detection and predictive customer support, freeing up employees to focus on strategic goals. H2O.ai offers open-source libraries and an AutoML platform (H2O Driverless AI) for building models without extensive coding.
use_case: Developing credit risk models to predict loan default (without hand-coding algorithms); detecting anomalies in transaction data for fraud in real-time; deploying predictive maintenance models in manufacturing using sensor data (via AutoML)

name: Hiver
description: Email-based customer service platform with AI features for Gmail
use_case: Shared inbox management; customer support; team collaboration

name: Hubspot Email Writer
description: AI-powered tool within Hubspot that helps create effective emails
pricing: Available in certain Hubspot plans from $20/month
use_case: Sales outreach; marketing campaigns; customer communications

name: Illustroke
description:
Illustroke is a platform that turns text prompts into SVG vector illustrations​

. Users input a description and Illustroke generates a scalable illustration that can be downloaded and edited. It’s useful for web designers or bloggers who need quick illustrations (like icons or simple drawings) to accompany content, and since output is SVG, it’s easy to adjust or animate.
use_case: Generating custom SVG icons or graphics from a text description (e.g., “a hand-drawn style icon of a rocket”); quickly getting vector illustrations for presentation graphics or infographics; creating unique SVG backgrounds or patterns based on descriptive prompts

name: Ink for All
description:
Ink for All is a content tool offering paraphrasing, AI writing, and SEO optimization suggestions​

. It helps writers improve their content’s readability and SEO performance. Users can generate alternative phrasings for sentences and get real-time content scores to ensure their writing is both engaging and search-engine friendly.
use_case: Rewriting existing content to improve clarity or avoid plagiarism; optimizing blog articles to rank higher (suggesting keywords, links); generating content for marketing that is SEO-tuned

name: Intercom Fin
description: AI customer service bot built into Intercom platform
pricing: Available as part of Intercom plans
use_case: Customer support automation; inquiry handling; ticket resolution

name: Intraspexion
description:
Intraspexion is a litigation-warning system that continuously scans written communications (like emails) for signs of legal risk​

. It uses an AI model in the background and alerts company counsel to potentially litigious language or issues before they escalate.
use_case: Monitoring corporate emails for phrases that indicate harassment, discrimination or contract breaches; early warning for legal team to intervene

name: JADBio
description:
JADBio is a user-friendly machine learning platform that features advanced knowledge extraction tools to assist students in learning machine learning. While it is primarily designed for multi-omics and biotech data, it can also be used to analyze a variety of curated datasets. It also enables users to create predictive models. One of JADBio’s best features is that it offers a lifetime free account for users​

.
use_case: Building predictive models from biomedical (omics) data; educational tool for ML students

name: Jasper
description:
Jasper is a content creation tool that allows users to generate a large amount of written content quickly​

. It’s used by bloggers or writers to produce posts without needing deep writing expertise. Jasper can create content drafts for blogs, marketing copy, etc., enabling users to focus on editing rather than writing from scratch.
use_case: Generating draft blog posts and articles at scale; writing product descriptions or ad copy quickly; overcoming writer’s block with AI-suggested content

name: Kickresume
description: AI-powered resume builder and career resources platform
use_case: Resume creation; cover letter writing; career advice

name: Krisp
description:
Krisp is an AI app that provides real-time noise cancellation for calls​

. It mutes background sounds with one click for both incoming and outgoing audio. Professionals use Krisp in remote meetings to eliminate distractions (like dog barks, traffic, keyboard typing) so that call audio is clean and focused only on human voices.
pricing: Freemium (Limited free use; Paid for unlimited)
use_case: Joining a conference call from a noisy environment (coffee shop, airport) and filtering out all background noise; recording a podcast or webinar in a non-studio setting by removing echo and ambient sounds; improving call center call quality by stripping agent background noise in real-time

name: Legal Robot
description: Legal Robot is an AI-powered business tool that makes legal support more accessible. It uses NLP and deep learning to analyze complex legal contracts, making them more readable. It can also assist in creating easier-to-understand contracts for employees. (Legal Robot helps simplify and clarify contract language.)
use_case: Analyzing employment contracts and policies for plain language; identifying confusing or risky clauses in business contracts

name: Looka
description: AI-powered logo and brand identity design platform
pricing: Logo packages from $20; subscription plans available
use_case: Logo design; brand identity creation; marketing materials

name: Lumen5
description:
Lumen5 is a free online video-making platform that provides tools to easily create videos​

. It features impressive templates and formats suitable for various social media platforms. The platform uses AI to generate a complete video sequence by incorporating images based on an imported transcript. Additionally, it offers a wide range of images and video clips to enhance your final video production.
use_case: Creating social media and marketing videos from blog posts or transcripts; quickly producing video ads

name: ManyChat
description:
ManyChat is a chatbot service that enables users to create chatbots without coding​

. It provides a suite of tools and features including analytics and integrations. ManyChat not only allows broadcasting messages to an audience but also supports interactive conversations. It’s widely used for Facebook Messenger marketing and can be deployed on websites or other messaging platforms.
use_case: Creating a Facebook Messenger bot for a business page to answer FAQs or promote offers; setting up an Instagram DM chatbot for customer inquiries; broadcasting updates or promotions to subscribers via chat

name: Mem.ai
description: AI-powered personal knowledge management system
pricing: Free tier available; paid plans from $7.99/month
use_case: Note-taking; information organization; personal knowledge base

name: Midjourney
description: AI image generation tool that creates images from text descriptions
use_case: Art creation; concept visualization; marketing imagery

name: Motion
description: AI productivity and scheduling tool that plans your day
use_case: Time blocking; task prioritization; meeting scheduling

name: Murf
description: AI voice generator with studio-quality voices for various content types
use_case: Podcast creation; eLearning voiceovers; explainer videos

name: Murf.ai
description:
Murf AI is a cloud-based, realistic text-to-speech platform that can generate voiceovers for various types of content, such as YouTube videos, podcasts, commercials, e-learning materials, presentations, and audiobooks​

.
use_case: Creating natural-sounding voice narrations for videos and presentations; producing podcast voiceovers without recording human voice

name: Neural Text
description:
Neural Text is an AI-driven content tool that generates quality text for various content needs​

. It can be used to write blog posts, social media posts, email newsletters, and more on any topic. Neural Text allows marketers to produce content at scale while aiming to retain human-like language quality.
use_case: Writing email newsletter drafts; producing filler content for social media calendars; generating blog content quickly for topical blogs

name: Notion AI Q&A
description: AI feature within Notion that answers questions about content in your workspace
pricing: Available as part of Notion AI add-on ($10/user/month)
use_case: Information retrieval; team knowledge base; document questions

name: Nyota
description: AI meeting assistant that transcribes meetings and generates actionable summaries
use_case: Meeting transcription; action item tracking; team collaboration

name: Ocoya
description:
Ocoya is a marketing platform that streamlines creating, scheduling, and analyzing content​

. It’s a top-performing tool for content marketers, featuring a drag-and-drop editor for posts and a library of images. Users can create social media posts and marketing content efficiently and manage their scheduling calendar all in one place.
use_case: Designing and scheduling a month’s worth of social media posts in one session; quickly creating visual quote cards or promotional graphics with provided templates; analyzing engagement metrics on posted content

name: On-page.ai
description:
On-Page.ai is a web-based SEO tool that helps companies optimize their website pages​

. It’s useful for digital agencies, content writers, and SEO specialists. On-Page.ai provides instant feedback on content quality and generates new content ideas. It analyzes a page’s content, detects SEO strengths and weaknesses, and offers suggestions for improvement.
use_case: Getting real-time SEO score and suggestions while writing web content; analyzing an existing webpage and receiving targeted recommendations (like adding keywords or improving readability); generating ideas to expand or update webpage content

name: OpusClip
description: AI tool that automatically cuts and edits long videos into short clips
pricing: Free tier available; paid plans start around $10/month
use_case: Social media content; marketing clips; repurposing long-form content

name: Oracle AI
description:
Oracle’s AI offerings (within Oracle Cloud) include an ML platform for developers and industry-specific AI solutions. Oracle AI can automatically extract data from documents, offers prebuilt chatbot tools, and allows integrating open-source frameworks into Oracle Cloud apps​

. For example, Oracle Digital Assistant is used to connect customers with resources or support via chat interfaces.
use_case: Scanning invoices and forms with AI to input into Oracle ERP without manual data entry; deploying an HR chatbot in an Oracle HCM system to answer employee questions; using Oracle AI to predict equipment failure in an Oracle IoT cloud setup by analyzing sensor data

name: Otter.ai
description:
Otter.ai is a digital assistant that automates meeting note-taking by transcribing audio recordings to text​

. It identifies key points and can generate an email summary for participants, capturing the essence of the meeting. It acts as a personal assistant, saving time in creating meeting minutes and ensuring everyone has a clear summary of discussions.
use_case: Live transcribing Zoom or in-person meetings for later reference; searching past meeting transcripts for decisions or action items; sharing automated meeting summaries with attendees

name: Outmatch (Harver)
description:
Outmatch is an AI-enabled hiring platform that consolidates recruiting processes​

. Its AI-powered workflow helps teams streamline operations and cut costs by ~40%. Solutions include efficient pre-hire assessments, automated interview scheduling, video interviews, and automated reference checking, all aimed at speeding up and improving the hiring process.
use_case: Automating candidate screening with online assessments and AI scoring; scheduling interviews without coordinator intervention; using AI to evaluate recorded video interviews for key traits; simplifying reference checks via automated surveys

name: Outranking
description:
Outranking is an AI-powered platform for creating content with a focus on SEO. It uses artificial intelligence to assist in automating copywriting and content generation​

. Users can produce content via a guided text editor, and the platform provides SEO recommendations to improve online presence and performance.
use_case: Writing SEO-optimized blog posts with AI guidance; automating the creation of content briefs based on search results; generating content that is structured for high ranking

name: Patterned.ai
description:
Patterned.ai allows users to generate unlimited unique designs or patterns tailored for products​

. The designs created are royalty-free, meaning they can be used repeatedly without extra cost. This is particularly useful for surface designers or print-on-demand businesses (e.g., creating patterns for fabric, wallpaper, or merchandise).
pricing: Freemium (Free limited generations; Paid for unlimited/full license)
use_case: Generating custom textile patterns for fashion or home decor; creating backgrounds or textures for graphic design projects; producing unique patterns for merchandise like phone cases or notebooks

name: People.ai
description:
People.ai is an AI-powered sales optimization tool that uses machine learning to identify patterns of successful sales interactions​

. It scans data from emails, calls, and meetings to model optimal sales strategies. The tool can detect unproductive behaviors and suggest improvements to increase sales efficiency, effectively helping sales teams focus on the activities that close deals.
use_case: Analyzing a salesperson’s email and call activity to determine if they are engaging enough with key stakeholders in an account; identifying which behaviors top performers do (number of calls, type of contacts, etc.) and coaching the rest of the team to emulate those; alerting sales managers when an important deal might be at risk due to dropping engagement levels

name: Peppertype
description:
Peppertype is a content creation tool that uses AI to create compelling content quickly​

. It simplifies writing high-quality content by helping users discover their unique voice through AI suggestions. Peppertype can generate copy for marketing, social media, product descriptions, and more in a short time.
use_case: Fast drafting of social media posts and captions; generating marketing taglines and product descriptions; brainstorming brand messaging ideas

name: Perplexity
description: AI-powered search engine and research assistant that provides cited answers to queries
pricing: Free tier available; Pro plan at $20/month
use_case: Research; information retrieval; learning

name: Pictory
description:
Pictory uses AI to convert long-form content into short branded videos suitable for social media (Instagram/Facebook/Snap stories)​

. It automatically cuts videos into shorter clips, analyzes text and video content to generate a script, and detects faces to create a thumbnail image for representation. It’s an efficient way to repurpose webinars or blogs into shareable videos.
use_case: Turning blog posts into engaging short video summaries; chopping up a webinar recording into key takeaway clips for social posting; auto-generating captioned vertical videos for TikTok/Instagram from longer horizontal videos

name: Podcastle
description:
Podcastle is a web-based platform that enables podcasters and other creators to record, edit, enhance, transcribe, and export their content with simplicity​

. It strives to be an all-in-one solution for podcast production, offering multi-track recording, AI-powered noise reduction, transcription, and even voice generation tools, all accessible in a browser.
pricing: Freemium (basic recording free; Paid for advanced features)
use_case: Recording remote podcast interviews in studio quality via a browser; editing a podcast by deleting text from the transcript (auto-reflecting in audio); applying AI-based noise reduction and sound leveling to output a polished podcast episode

name: Post Intelligence
description:
Post Intelligence is an AI-powered social media manager that analyzes your profiles and followers to improve your content strategy​

. It uses NLP and sentiment analysis to suggest topics, visuals, tone, and emotional cues to better engage your audience. It also suggests optimal posting times and tracks post performance, integrating social media metrics with powerful ML algorithms for recommendations.
use_case: Analyzing past Tweets to suggest what content resonates with a Twitter audience and recommending new tweet topics; examining Instagram engagement data to guide an influencer on which themes or hashtags to use; providing an editorial calendar with suggested content types and ideal post times to maximize reach

name: Presentations.ai
description: AI tool that generates professional presentations from text input
pricing: Contact for pricing; enterprise plans available
use_case: Automated presentation creation; design improvement; content organization

name: ProWritingAid
description:
ProWritingAid is an AI-powered writing assistant that helps writers by generating content ideas and providing grammar/style suggestions​

. It’s known as a grammar checker and style editor that goes beyond basics to improve structure and clarity. ProWritingAid can be integrated into writing software to give real-time feedback.
use_case: Checking and correcting grammar and punctuation in manuscripts or articles; receiving style improvement tips for business reports or books; getting suggestions to tighten and clarify prose

name: Puzzle
description:
Puzzle is a tool that converts your content into an interactive glossary widget with clear explanations of important terms​

. With a few clicks, you can embed this widget in a blog or documentation site. When readers highlight a term, Puzzle provides the definition and links to related content. It’s essentially an AI-powered glossary to improve content comprehension.
use_case: Enhancing technical blog posts by providing pop-up definitions for jargon or acronyms; adding a glossary to a documentation site without manually writing one; helping onboarding materials by auto-linking key concepts to their explanations

name: Quickchat
description:
Quickchat is an AI assistant designed to mimic human interaction and provide immediate, accurate responses to customer inquiries​

. It can be easily integrated into any website without technical knowledge, and also offers an API. Quickchat is often used to add a conversational AI on websites for handling customer questions or as a virtual assistant in apps.
use_case: Embedding a FAQ chatbot on an e-commerce site to answer product questions; adding a 24/7 support agent on a SaaS platform’s help center; using the API to power chat in a mobile app (e.g., a travel app assistant)

name: Quill (Narrative Science)
description:
Quill is a natural language generation (NLG) reporting platform​

. It automatically turns data into narrative reports. Companies use Quill to create written summaries of business intelligence data (instead of reading charts). Quill increases engagement by providing easy-to-understand narratives compared to raw dashboards.
use_case: Generating written analysis from dashboards (e.g., monthly sales reports in plain English); translating complex metrics into simple stories for executives

name: QuillBot
description:
QuillBot is an AI writing tool for proofreading, paraphrasing, and summarizing content​

. It checks grammar and spelling, and can rephrase text in different styles. QuillBot also offers a plagiarism checker and a summarizer for condensing long articles. It’s commonly used by students and professionals to refine writing.
pricing: Freemium (Free with limitations; Paid for full features)
use_case: Paraphrasing sentences to avoid plagiarism or improve fluency; summarizing academic papers or articles; checking essays for grammar errors and fixing them

name: Reclaim
description: AI scheduling tool that automatically organizes calendar and prioritizes tasks
pricing: Free tier available; paid plans from $8/user/month
use_case: Time management; meeting scheduling; productivity

name: Runway
description: AI-powered creative suite for video editing and generation with tools like Gen-2
use_case: Video editing; special effects; content creation

name: Rytr
description: AI writing assistant that helps create content for various purposes
pricing: Free tier available; premium plans start at $9/month
use_case: Blog writing; marketing copy; social media content

name: SAS
description:
SAS is an analytics platform that now integrates open-source and cloud tech to assist in data-driven decisions​

. SAS provides features like customer intelligence, risk assessment, identity verification, and forecasting using AI and advanced analytics. It’s a long-standing enterprise analytics suite now enhanced with machine learning and supports for big data in cloud environments.
use_case: Building predictive models for customer churn and integrating into marketing campaigns; running risk analytics for banking (credit scoring, fraud detection) with SAS’s regulatory compliance in mind; performing demand forecasting for inventory using SAS’s time series algorithms with machine learning enhancements

name: Salesforce Einstein
description:
Salesforce Einstein is an AI assistant within Salesforce CRM. It automates CRM tasks and simplifies chat interactions by learning from customer data​

. It applies best practices from analyzing data to improve customer experience – for example, suggesting next steps for sales or automatically inputting data.
use_case: Automating data entry in CRM (e.g., logging calls, updating records); recommending leads or opportunities to pursue; powering chatbots in customer service

name: Salesforce Einstein (Platform)
description:
Salesforce (as a platform) uses cloud and machine learning to manage customer service, sales, and product development​

. Einstein AI within Salesforce offers recommendations and automates repetitive data entry. Additionally, Salesforce’s ecosystem allows integrating various AI apps for customization. (In essence, Salesforce is a top SaaS CRM with an AI “smart assistant” layer).
use_case: Automating lead scoring and opportunity insights in CRM; providing service agents with next-best-action recommendations based on past case data; auto-filling CRM fields from email or calendar data (e.g., adding meeting notes or contacts)

name: SaneBox
description: AI email management tool that automatically organizes your inbox
use_case: Email prioritization; inbox organization; follow-up reminders

name: Sapling
description:
Sapling is a versatile chatbot that can be used for customer service, sales, and internal collaboration​

. It significantly reduces response time by automating day-to-day interactions like scheduling meetings and answering common inquiries. Sapling integrates into chat systems to assist teams by providing quick, AI-generated responses or actions.
use_case: Automating initial customer support chats to gather info or answer FAQs; assisting sales reps by handling simple customer queries on websites; internal helpdesk bot for employees

name: Shortwave
description: AI-enhanced email app that organizes and summarizes emails
pricing: Free tier available; premium features from $9/month
use_case: Email management; inbox organization; priority sorting

name: Soundraw
description:
Soundraw is a royalty-free music library that uses AI technology to quickly find or generate the right music for a project​

. Users can specify the type of music, length, and instruments, and the AI will generate a list of matching music pieces. It’s similar to traditional stock music selection but augmented by AI for faster, more customized results.
use_case: Specifying mood and duration to get a soundtrack for a YouTube video; choosing and slightly tweaking a generated music piece for a TV commercial background; quickly generating multiple variations of a theme music to pick the best fit

name: Speechify
description: AI text-to-speech platform
use_case: Text reading; accessibility; content consumption

name: StockImg
description:
StockImg is an AI-powered tool that simplifies creating visuals like posters, UI mockups, wallpapers, icons, book covers, and stock images​

. Users provide descriptions and StockImg generates professional-quality images for projects or websites, saving time on searching traditional stock libraries. It’s like having a personalized stock image generator on demand.
pricing: Freemium (limited free uses; Paid for higher-res and commercial rights)
use_case: Generating a quick book cover concept from a synopsis; creating background images for a website section based on a theme (instead of searching stock sites manually); making custom wallpaper images or UI illustrations via prompts

name: Study Crumb
description:
Study Crumb offers several free writing tools to help writers work faster. One example is a summarizing tool that condenses large amounts of text into key ideas​

. These tools are aimed at students and researchers who need to parse through lots of material quickly or improve their writing efficiency.
use_case: Summarizing academic articles or chapters for study notes; quickly generating outlines or thesis statements from long texts; grammar and spell-checking essays

name: Sudowrite
description: AI writing assistant specifically designed for creative writers and novelists
pricing: Free trial; subscriptions start at around $10/month
use_case: Fiction writing; creative writing; story development

name: Suno
description: AI music generation platform that creates original songs from text descriptions
pricing: Free tier with limitations; premium plans available
use_case: Original music creation; soundtrack development; creative expression

name: Surfer SEO
description: AI-powered SEO content optimization platform
use_case: Content optimization; SEO analysis; key

name: SurferSEO
description:
SurferSEO is a web-based SEO tool with a comprehensive set of features for digital marketing agencies and individuals​

. Its user-friendly interface includes site audit, keyword research, competitor analysis, backlink analysis, and on-page optimization suggestions. SurferSEO’s AI helps SEO professionals improve content and website performance.
use_case: Auditing a website’s on-page SEO and getting recommendations; researching competitors’ content to identify keyword gaps; analyzing backlink profiles to plan outreach

name: Symantec Endpoint Protection
description:
Symantec Endpoint Protection (by Broadcom) uses machine learning to secure digital assets​

. It learns to distinguish good and malicious files over time. The AI-driven interface automatically updates and adapts from security threats to combat malware, eliminating the need for manual configurations. This is an enterprise antivirus and endpoint security solution enhanced with AI.
use_case: Detecting and blocking zero-day malware on employee computers using ML patterns; automatically updating threat signatures and models as new attack data comes in; distinguishing normal application behavior from potential exploits in real-time

name: Synthesia
description: AI video generation platform that creates videos from text with AI avatars
use_case: Training videos; marketing content; educational material

name: Tableau
description:
Tableau is a business intelligence tool that now incorporates AI and augmented analytics for fast insights​

. It enables companies to make industry predictions and develop strategies by turning data into interactive visualizations. Tableau’s AI features (like Explain Data, Ask Data) allow users to query data in natural language and get AI-generated explanations of trends.
use_case: Drag-and-drop creation of dashboards with AI highlights of noteworthy changes; asking questions like “Why did sales increase in Q4?” and getting an explanation visualization; forecasting future metrics (e.g., sales, inventory) based on historical data trends

name: Tamr
description:
Tamr is a data unification platform that uses machine learning to unify and cleanse data from many sources​

. It brings together data into one secure location and integrates with new and legacy software. Tamr’s ML helps manage large datasets in the cloud, merging records and removing duplicates for a single source of truth.
use_case: Merging customer records from multiple databases; cleaning and deduplicating product data; integrating siloed enterprise data for analytics

name: Tara
description:
Tara is a productivity tool for managing product development tasks. It is ideal for product managers, developers, and designers to collaborate on software projects​

. Tara streamlines day-to-day tasks by focusing team members on writing code, designing features, and collaborating with customers while it handles project planning and task tracking.
use_case: Automating sprint planning by assigning tasks based on team capacity; tracking progress of software development in real-time; integrating customer feedback into the task management workflow

name: Teal
description: AI-powered career platform with resume building features
use_case: Resume creation; job application tracking; career development

name: TextBlaze
description:
TextBlaze is an AI-powered text automation tool that allows customizable text snippets​

. Users can create templates and insert them quickly, with dynamic placeholders. It’s like AI-assisted text expansion, useful for repetitive writing tasks (like support responses).
use_case: Speeding up customer support replies with templated answers; inserting frequently-used paragraphs in legal documents or sales outreach; automating form filling with personalized data

name: Textio
description: AI writing platform that optimizes job listings and recruiting communications
use_case: Job description optimization; recruiting communications; employer branding

name: Theano
description:
Theano is a deep learning library (historically one of the first, now largely succeeded by others) that allows developers to create, optimize, and launch code projects​

. Its AI capabilities were described as enabling it to identify and fix bugs with minimal assistance (though in practice Theano is mainly a computation library). It’s an open-source project that was used for neural network research.
pricing: Paid (Open-source, but maintenance costs if used)
use_case: (Historically) Developing custom neural network models from scratch for research purposes; performing mathematical computations for deep learning with GPU acceleration; experimenting with novel AI algorithms at a low level

name: Thundercontent
description:
Thundercontent is an AI-based platform for content creation that uses AI to automate copywriting​

. It provides a text editor with an AI assistant to help generate and refine content. Users can produce content with minimal effort and export it from the platform. Thundercontent is useful for writers who want to leverage AI to speed up their content production workflow.
use_case: Writing long-form articles with AI suggestions as you type; using the AI to generate content for sections of a report or whitepaper; quickly getting a first draft of marketing content which you can then edit and polish

name: Tidio AI
description: AI-powered chatbot and live chat platform for customer service
pricing: Free tier available; paid plans from $19/month
use_case: Customer support; lead generation; sales assistance

name: Time Doctor
description:
Time Doctor is a tool that helps remote and on-site employees stay productive and focused​

. It tracks work time, monitors activity, and provides detailed productivity reports. Companies use Time Doctor to manage distributed teams or to monitor employee activity, and it offers feedback on improving productivity and efficiency.
use_case: Monitoring a remote team’s work hours and activity levels; generating reports on how time is spent on different applications or tasks; identifying productivity leaks and distractions

name: Time Hero
description:
Time Hero is a task-management and scheduling software that uses automation to optimize your time. It creates a daily schedule based on your availability and priorities​

. If your schedule changes, Time Hero automatically reorganizes tasks. It essentially acts as a smart to-do list that adjusts in real-time.
use_case: Automatically scheduling tasks around meetings; adjusting project timelines dynamically as deadlines change; prioritizing tasks based on user-defined goals

name: Timely App
description:
Timely is an AI-powered time-tracking software. It automates timesheet creation by recording work activity across apps​

. It can suggest what to prioritize and provides analytics on how time is spent. Professionals use Timely to ensure their timesheets are accurate without manual timers.
use_case: Automatic time logging for client projects; analyzing team productivity by aggregating time data; identifying time sinks to improve workflow

name: Tome
description: AI-powered storytelling and presentation platform
use_case: Presentation creation; storytelling; content generation

name: Toonly
description:
Toonly is an AI-powered tool that allows users to create cartoon-style animated videos by simply recording themselves and letting the AI animate an avatar​

. It takes a smartphone-recorded video of a person and converts it into an animated character performing the same actions. This makes it easy to create explainer or fun cartoon videos without traditional animation skills.
use_case: Recording a founder speaking and turning it into an animated explainer video for a startup; creating simple cartoon marketing videos for a product using non-artist staff; making training videos with animated characters instead of filming real people

name: Trevor
description:
Trevor syncs your to-do list with Google Calendar, helping you accomplish your most important work​

. It helps organize and prioritize projects and tasks, allowing you to work through them with ease. Trevor’s interface lets you set reminders for upcoming events, meetings, calls, or tasks, ensuring nothing is missed.
use_case: Converting a simple task list into calendar blocks for timeboxing; ensuring key tasks are allocated time slots on your calendar; receiving reminders for tasks and events combined

name: Udio
description: AI music creation platform for generating custom tracks
use_case: Background music; podcast intros; social media content

name: Unbounce
description:
Unbounce is a landing page builder for marketers that uses drag-and-drop and AI features to create customized, responsive landing pages​

. Marketers can use Unbounce to quickly launch campaign pages without coding, and the platform includes AI-driven optimizations (like Smart Traffic which automatically directs visitors to the best variant).
use_case: Creating a campaign landing page to capture leads (e.g., for a webinar or ebook) within minutes; A/B testing different page designs and letting AI automatically serve the best performer; quickly designing mobile-responsive promo pages for ads

name: Vidyo
description:
Vidyo.ai allows users to upload a video or provide a YouTube link and then automatically creates short, customized videos from it​

. Users specify target platforms, formats, and templates, and the AI will generate edited clips (e.g., highlights or subtitles added) tailored for those specs. This is especially useful for repurposing long videos into snippets for social media.
use_case: Taking a long webinar or interview and auto-generating several 1-minute highlight videos for social sharing; converting a horizontal 16:9 YouTube video into a vertical TikTok-style video with captions and cuts; quickly generating teaser clips for a podcast episode recorded on video

name: Vista Social
description: AI-powered social media management platform
use_case: Scheduling posts; content creation; analytics

name: Voicemaker
description:
Voicemaker is an AI-based tool that generates natural-sounding voiceovers for media including television, radio, film, video games, and business videos​

. It can convert text into speech in many voices and styles, helping content creators produce audio tracks without hiring voice actors. Users can adjust parameters like pitch, speed, and emphasis to tailor the voice output.
pricing: Freemium (Free with limited characters; Paid for higher usage)
use_case: Generating narration for training videos in multiple languages; adding voiceover to a promotional video without a human speaker; creating different character voices for an indie video game using text scripts

name: Wordtune
description: AI writing companion that helps rephrase and improve text
use_case: Rewording sentences; improving clarity; style adjustments

name: WriteCream
description:
WriteCream is a content writing assistant that helps craft personalized outreach emails​

. It can generate emails given minimal inputs, allowing users to quickly personalize messages at scale. With WriteCream, tasks like cold emailing prospects can be sped up by auto-generating introductory paragraphs tailored to each recipient.
use_case: Creating personalized sales or outreach emails based on prospect data; generating introduction text for LinkedIn connection requests; writing custom snippets for cold email campaigns in bulk

name: WriteSonic
description:
WriteSonic is an open-source web application that generates content for websites and blogs​

. It’s designed with input from human copywriters to better model effective writing. WriteSonic helps overcome writer’s block and can generate ideas for new topics on a large scale by producing AI-written drafts.
use_case: Generating blog ideas and outlines; writing full blog drafts or marketing emails; creating multiple versions of ad copy to A/B test

name: WriterZen
description:
WriterZen is a tool that simplifies the task of keyword research​

. It helps content writers easily generate relevant content ideas and high-demand topics for their target audience. Essentially, WriterZen merges AI and SEO data to identify what topics a site should cover and helps plan content outlines accordingly.
use_case: Discovering trending topics and keywords in a niche; generating blog topic ideas that have high search demand; building content outlines with relevant subtopics to cover

name: X.ai
description:
X.ai is a scheduling tool that is easy to use, with many features available at no cost​

. By connecting your calendars, the AI can generate meeting invitations that include both parties’ availability, time zones, and details. It automates the back-and-forth of scheduling meetings via email by acting as a virtual assistant that finds mutually free times.
use_case: Automatically coordinating meeting times between several people via email; sending calendar invites with all necessary info (time zone conversions, etc.); managing interview scheduling for recruiters

name: YVA.ai
description:
YVA.ai is a leadership platform that helps companies improve employee experience and productivity by analyzing feedback in real time​

. The platform provides insights into trends, best practices, and opportunities for improvement by processing employee surveys and other feedback data. It uses data-driven insights to optimize manager–employee relationships.
use_case: Real-time analysis of employee engagement survey results; identifying teams at risk of burnout or low morale; recommending management actions to improve productivity and satisfaction

name: Zendesk
description:
Zendesk’s customer service software uses AI and data to create personalized experiences. It helps handle support tickets by gathering, organizing, and analyzing information across sources​

. Zendesk can connect with other programs to collect data, streamlining customer support workflows.
use_case: Managing customer support tickets with AI triage; providing agents with suggested responses; consolidating customer data for 360° support

name: Zenefits
description:
Zenefits is an HR management software that streamlines tasks like payroll and benefits administration with self-operating workflows​

. It automates many HR processes, and provides reports on workforce metrics (turnover, diversity, compensation) to gain insights and improve efficiency.
use_case: Automating onboarding paperwork (contracts, tax forms); running payroll with minimal manual input; tracking HR metrics for compliance and strategic decisions

name: Zoho Zia
description:
Zoho Zia is an AI-powered virtual assistant integrated into Zoho’s CRM. It automates repetitive tasks, generates reports, and provides data analysis suggestions​

. Zia can notify salespeople of next best actions by analyzing customer data (for example, which deal to follow up on).
use_case: Automating CRM data entry and report generation; getting AI-driven sales prompts (e.g., which leads to contact); workflow automation in Zoho applications

name: v0
description: AI-powered design and development platform
pricing: Free tier available; paid plans for higher usage
use_case: Web design; UI generation; front-end development
